website_summaries.verdict: The Fiesta brand is known for including a huge range of species-specific ingredients that are both nourishing and tasty, and the Big Bites are perfectly sized to satisfy large parrots like macaws and cockatoos.
pros: Sunflower, safflower, almonds, corn, whole peanuts, and corn are the first 6 ingredients
Features healthy pieces like coconut, carrots, and pineapple
cons: This mix includes a large amount of fatty sunflower seeds and peanuts

customer_reviews.title: Empty Shells
customer_reviews.text: Have several peanut shells that are empty, several halves of hazel nuts and halves of walnut shells. These add weight to the bag but no food. They need better monitoring of their product when filling the bags and make sure there are not empty shells to so many kinds of nuts. At first I thought it was just an innocent slight not noticing this, but every other hand full has an empty shell or half shell of the nuts included. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: even after freezing
customer_reviews.text: We have been buying this food for years, and freeze it, to kill whatever may be alive in there (worms/maggots) well, Ive been noticing a few moths here and there, my husband checked the food, and sure enough, the container was packed with them. Needless to say, $30 couple worth of food had to go to the trash!! Premium food at premium dollars, should not have worms or maggots in it! Get it together Kaytee!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Too many monkey biscuits
customer_reviews.text: There are too many of the these called monkey buscuits in the bags . They are huge and take up space, they are the square brown things in the bags( in case your wondering). Most Macaws just throw them, then 1/4 of the mix is too small for a Macaw. So that part had to come out for my Amazon. I had barely enough food for the Macaw after separating out the things that didn’t belong
customer_reviews.author: indydog

customer_reviews.title: Normally great parrot food, this bad sucked for quality.
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of crumbs and empty nut shells. This bag is disappointing in its quality. The last 4 bags were much better quality. This one seems really degraded. Everything is very dry and not appealing looking. I'm sure it happens. Hopefully next month's bag will be better as I order this on a schedule to add to my parrots diet.
customer_reviews.author: Luv

customer_reviews.title: Great value for size and price for macaws&parrots
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering for months and have been pleased with every bag so far.But this batch had more filler sunflower seeds and biscuits,but less pumpkin seeds and Filbert's compared to others.peanuts also seemed black in spots-moldy.. my macaw ate this,but was more picky than usual.i guess he could taste the difference in quality and freshness .
customer_reviews.author: celestetfelice

customer_reviews.title: is ok
customer_reviews.text: its cheaper food than I normally get. as the better food has increased substantially in price for me. has some bigger pieces but in general its a bit small stuff for mccaw, he eats it. you get what you pay for, I didn't want to pay a lot, so this does the trick. why is bird seed so expensive??
customer_reviews.author: Slick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good basic seed diet.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent mix of nuts. Not as good as the Hahns Big Beaks but not a bunch of wasted small seeds and nuts like some add. I am pretty happy with it and will add a friit and nut blast and some nutriberries to fill out their diet. I have a Scarlet Macaw and two African Gray Congos.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Ann

customer_reviews.title: The Best Food for your Bird.....Elvis loves it.....and we love the convenience...
customer_reviews.text: the best find in 10 years...... I cannot tell you how hard it is to find this food here in the Northeast...now my to go vendor once a month....I love it and my bird Elvis loves it too.........
customer_reviews.author: James Francis McHugh

customer_reviews.title: My parrot enjoy every meal
customer_reviews.text: My parrots love this diet. To be honest, I mix this Kaytee Fiesta Big Bites Diet with the Kaytee Forti Diet Pro Health to create my own blend. Strangely enough, my Macaws don't know what to do with the walnuts in the shell and drop them to the bottom of the cage. However, everything else is eaten enthusiastically.
customer_reviews.author: JSB from Delaware

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely happy with this product!! My macaw love everything that came in this bag. This is the second time I bought this particular bag and I will be buying more. Great variety and very fresh NO bugs or dust in the bag. Thank you amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Casandra Torrales

customer_reviews.title: Our Cockatoo Peaches loves it
customer_reviews.text: Peaches is a bit picky so we tried this and she loves it. She does pick through and the walnuts are not easy for her to open so I tap them with a hammer, but all in all its a win for her
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Granda

customer_reviews.title: Birds love it
customer_reviews.text: Product does not contain alot of millet, which is a very good thing if you have large birds. Contains alot of nutritious items to keep your birds healthy.
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN HOFFMAN

customer_reviews.title: Mostly
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be more peanuts than anything.. pretty expensive for a bag of peanuts! And my blue and gold doesn’t seem to like many of the pieces in this mix.. a lot ends up on the cage floor! Time to go back to the store bought type.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great nuts and variety
customer_reviews.text: Our Macaw loves when this bag arrives every month. We use it as a supplement and he is excited when then new bag arrives.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Parrot food
customer_reviews.text: Great bird food for the money my Blue and Gold Mccaw loves it
customer_reviews.author: joseph lanatovich

customer_reviews.title: Best you can get for the right price.
customer_reviews.text: Our macaws love this mix, we add calcium and multivitamins to it. They love it and they don't scatter around much of it. That was a problem I had with other different mixes, they were always throwing out the most of them and just going for peanuts or sun flower seeds. I recommend Big Bites.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolai Rivera

customer_reviews.title: This bag was almost entirely nuts and my macaw would ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag was almost entirely nuts and my macaw would throw much of it out of the bowl digging for sunflower seeds. I ended up having to buy a different Variety of food bag and mix the two.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: She loves it. Doesn’t throw it out the side of her cage like other brands
customer_reviews.author: maryb

customer_reviews.title: My macaw loves this
customer_reviews.text: My macaw is picky. I usually buy fm browns tropical carnival macaw mix but when the price goes up I switch to this.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great for larger birds
customer_reviews.text: Great for price, lots of variety and large pieces of fruits and nuts not so much corn and seed filler like most
customer_reviews.author: Sandys chicken coop

customer_reviews.title: Too many peppers.
customer_reviews.text: My birds like everything except the peppers. There is an overwhelming amount of them. I changed brands due to this.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Ray

customer_reviews.title: ... peanuts as compared to larger nuts that large parrots like. Many small seeds too that many large parrots ...
customer_reviews.text: Way too many peanuts as compared to larger nuts that large parrots like. Many small seeds too that many large parrots don't like so there is a lot of waste with this product for large parrots.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Good mix of nuts and Macaw goodies.
customer_reviews.text: Our Macaws love this mix. We mix this with some fresh fruits & veggies and Kaytee Fiesta Macaw. Great blend.
customer_reviews.author: SwedeNC

customer_reviews.title: Defective and unsafe item
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered smashed. Open and torn bag. They even taped it shut and delivered it still.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When I recieved the bag it was very poor quality lots of dust and all brown up nuts
customer_reviews.text: When I recieved the bag it was very poor quality lots of dust and all broken up nuts .. I'll just go get a bag for 10$ more from my local pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Selene H

customer_reviews.title: Too many peanuts
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product quite a few times,I have a macaw . Way to many peanuts so many that the bird would not eat that many and the nuts would be tossed the bird dug out the smaller sunflower and bird seed
customer_reviews.author: James Deckrow

customer_reviews.title: Great bites for big birds
customer_reviews.text: my macaws lives this food please bring back the ten pound bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is not fresh or stored properly, Peanuts are moldy and a lot of dust.MHO
customer_reviews.author: Jerry.T

customer_reviews.title: Macaw Food
customer_reviews.text: Blue and gold Macaw loves this food. Would like to have less peanuts.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Where are the Big nuts?
customer_reviews.text: Too many very small nuts that are not as well suited for large hook bill parrots
customer_reviews.author: W. Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my bird very happy.
customer_reviews.text: My Blue and Gold Macaw loves this food. He gets excited every time we get it delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Rainy Day

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Brown's Tropical Carnival Macaw Big Bites, thought I would try this, so far my Blue and Gold loves it. It could use some more larger bits but it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Harald E Scmidt

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before using
customer_reviews.text: Had flies all over my house when I use this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it. My bird
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I don't like it. My bird, Boudreaux, likes it. Though he mostly prefers the bigger, nuttier pieces that he can crack open.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Leamons

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Jerry our Macaw seems to like it, what else can I say.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jerome

product_meta.title: Kaytee Gourmet Big Bites Macaw Food
product_meta.description: Size:10 lbKaytee Fiesta Big Bites Macaw food contain ingredients specially selected for larger birds. Larger pieces of fruits, nuts, and vegetables are combined with premium extruded nutrition to create the perfect blend of size and flavor variety. Kaytee Fiesta Big Bites Foods are nutritionally fortified with the essential vitamins and minerals bird’s need to live a long and healthy life. The bigger pieces provide added enrichment and encourage natural foraging behavior. Kaytee Fiesta Big Bites Foods can be fed as bird’s primary diet or as added variety to an existing diet.
feature_bullets: Nutritionally Fortified Gourmet Food For Macaws
Omega 3'S To Support Brain And Heart Health
Antioxidants For General Health And Immune Support
Enhances Skin And Feather Health For Vibrant, Healthy Plumage
Contains Fruits, Nuts, Veggies And Textures For Nutritional Variety
Prebiotics And Probiotics To Support Digestive Health

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
